definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf, ´[[א]] Ge 19:3; [[אָפִיתִי]] Is 44:19; [[וְאָפו]] consec. Le 26:26 etc.; Impf 3 fs. sf. [[וַתּׂפֵהו]]1Sa 28:24; [[יאׁפו]] Ez Eze 46:20; [[תּאׂפו]] Ex 16:23; Imv. [[אֵפו]] Ex 16:23; Pt. [[אׂפֶה]] Ge 40:1+; [[אׂפֵהֶם]] Ho 7:6; pl. [[אׂפִים]] Ge 40:16 + ; [[אׂפוֹת]] 1Sa 8:13, etc.—bake, obj. [[לֶחֶם]]Le 26:26 (H) Is 44:15, Is 44:19 (cf. Je 37:21); [[מַצּוֹת]] Ge 19:3 (J) 1Sa 28:24 [[עֻגוֹת מחות]] Ex 12:39 (J); [[חַלּוֹת]] Le 24:5 (H); [[מִנְחָה]] Ez Eze 46:20; [[מָן]] Ex 16:23, Ex 16:23. (P;—c 2nd obj. of material Ex 12:39 [[בָּחֵק]], Le 24:5 [[סׂלֶת]], 1Sa 28:24 [[קֶמַח]]). Pt. alw. as subst. baker Ge 40:1, Ge 40:2, Ge 40:5, Ge 40:16, Ge 40:17, Ge 40:20, Ge 40:22, Ge 41:10 (all E) Ho 7:4, Ho 7:6; Je 37:21 ´[[מִחוּץ הָא]] out of the bakers’ street; also 1Sa 8:13 (‖[[טַבָּחוֹת]], [[רַקָּחוֹת]] only here fem.) Nowhere as a menial office, not even 1Sa 8:13 where despotic power & growth of court emphasized.
